extendedInfo.description: Hashi Bridges is a mentally challenging and addictive logic puzzle game. Known in Japan as Hashiwokakero by Nikoli (known for sudoku). Connect islands by bridges using skill and logic. It's not as simple as it sounds! ***This version has been replaced by Hashi Bridges FREE 1.3 and Hashi Bridges PRO 1.3 - check out the 'More from Developer' links*** We strongly recommend that either of these are installed rather than this one. We have added some exciting new features that YOU guys suggested and requested. Due to technical reasons this version will no longer be supported. Thank you!

reviews.title: Great progression of play due to skill!
reviews.comment: I can always get better or faster, supr logial, fun game to play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great little logic game
reviews.comment: The only downside so far is that I can\'t figure out how to remove a bridge.  If I put 1 down accidentally then I have to draw 2 more to remove the one.  If you like logic games, be sure to check out Hitori too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game, but as Eric said, you should add a \"restart puzzle\" or \"start over puzzle\" option. Other than that, excellent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Graphics let down.
reviews.comment: Lines between numbers do not always appear. This makes the game confusing and difficult, causing me to make mistakes and lengthening my time. No good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Fun game but needs a few intuitive changes. Easier to erase a line for example, restart a puzzle added, and maybe offering to play new game after being winner offered on screen instead of menu are the few I can think of. Tons of fun overall
reviews.author: M J Hardt

reviews.title: Fun and brain stimulating
reviews.comment: Whenever I have free time I play this game. It\'s really simple and yet quite complicated sometimes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Graphics
reviews.comment: I guess the graphics could be better, I know it\'s hard with an app like this, but idk could be better. Also, could you add an option to turn off full screen? It\'s nice to not have to leave the app to check if I got a text. Not really anything worth taking down the rating, but just some constructive criticism.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and enjoyable
reviews.comment: I am enjoying this game. Two small issues:  1. I think sometimes there are multiple correct solutions. 2. I haven\'t figured out how to get back to the main menu from the game yet Good
reviews.author: Finbar McLoughlin

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: User interface slows me down, especially when it creates a different link from the one I\'m trying to create. Otherwise, pretty good - stable, quick,etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A restart option would be nice,
reviews.comment: Other then that its great, fun, challenging, and addicting. I play it at least 40-50 times a day(usually more). I play it right when i wake up, during commercials, when bored, in between texting, when in bathroom, and right before i go to sleep(i can never bring my self to fall asleep, the urge to play one more game is to strong, i end up sleeping past 12)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A good hashi game
reviews.comment: This was the second hachi game I tried on Android and I can\'t say anything bad about it. The interface works nicely, though the screen gets crowded on the hardest difficulty. No problem on bigger screens, I believe, but my old 3.5\" device makes it too easy to draw wrong lines on accident.
reviews.author: Johannes Stenman

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: So logical, so fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sacrificial game required to learn the rules
reviews.comment: But simple, quick and straightforward to play. Hard to put down!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool little puzzler
reviews.comment: Simple fun and addictive.
reviews.author: Keith Coulson

reviews.title: Puzzles ftw
reviews.comment: I love these games that make you think. It doesn\'t matter if your bored or procrastinating you can sit for hours and play this game. It is great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: I just keep coming back to this game! It\'s challenging, but that\'s the attraction.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Fun and addictive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: Makes you use your brain but it doesn\'t stress you out either.... good game!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but I want more
reviews.comment: I love this game but I would love it even more if each game had a unique solution. Somehow it doesn\'t seem right for a logic puzzle to have multiple correct solutions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Challenging game but...
reviews.comment: - Puzzles of this genre are  supposed to have unique solutions. The app fails to make sure of this. - As has been said, no restart facility. - No zoom/scroll - the whole puzzle is just squashed to fit the screen. So unless you have a big screen (for a phone anyway), intermediate and hard levels are very fiddly.
reviews.author: Stewart Gordon
